title: Star of Fortune!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Oh, over there! It’s Yohane’s favorite pastry shop...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Looks like they’re on holiday.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>...Oof, why is my luck so bad... I guess I really am under the star of misfortune–<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>What? Star of misfortune? What are you talking about?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You’re with the galaxy’s number one idol Nico-nii, so you’re under the star of fortune!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You’re that lucky!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Of course, nico! Alright, now that you’re under the star of fortune with Nico-nii, let’s go explore and find a new pastry shop! With my luck, I’m sure you’ll find another one you’ll like!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I-I guess...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Alright, let’s go~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
